Title: React Developer Intern
Description:
About the job
The Internet Folks is a crazy, fun, and tea-loving team of developers, designers, and innovators who do not just code their products but shape them with love. 

We believe that people come first and that’s why we prioritize growth of our team members above product and profit. We've seen firsthand the positive impact that prioritizing our people can have - just check out our impressive track record of delivering 8 products to large enterprises including Fortune 500.

Title: Software Engineer Intern
Description:
About the job
About Us:

Formulo is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Software Engineer, you will develop and maintain our innovative platform that connects dermatologists to patients nationwide, focusing on both backend and frontend technologies. Join us in revolutionizing the dermatology industry and making quality skincare accessible to all.

Title: Software Engineer Intern
Description:
About the job
We are currently accepting applications for this position. It remains open as long as this job posting is visible.

Location: Fully Remote (Open to applicants from every country)
Type: Internship
Duration: Flexible, with potential for conversion to a permanent role based on performance.
Compensation: Our starting salaries for interns are matched to the level of developing countries. After 3 months, there is an opportunity for re-negotiation and stock options are available.

Title: DeFi Software Engineer Internship
Description:
About the job
HOW TO APPLY(NOT VIA THE APPLY BUTTON): 
Send CV and a text with your motivation and a brief explanation on "Which DEFI problem a DEX aggregator is trying to solve?" to hr@otex.tools(AI texts are easily noticed and will lead to auto rejection)

WHO WE ARE:
OTEX is building scalable and hypercompetitive intent settlement infrastructure across chains and dApps. Our systems have settled +5B USD of on-chain transactions. Some of the proprietary on-chain and off-chain software we currently maintain and are integrating across different DeFi protocols are:

Title: Backend Developer (Node.js & Python)
Description:
About the job
Company Description:
Koottu Inc. is an innovative dating platform that fosters meaningful connections within the Malayalee community. We're seeking a talented Flutter Architect to join our dynamic team and lead the technical aspects of our app.
Koottu utilizes AI to connect individuals across borders while blending traditional values with modern technology. Our goal is to help people find their ideal 'Koottu' no matter where they are located.

Title: Backend Developer (NodeJS/Python/Go)
Description:
About the job
Our client, Local Factor Group is hiring for a Backend developer who knows Python and Go. You will work with a bunch of experts in various technologies on exciting work in innovative interfaces and ad technologies.
You Have:
Engineering Degree (BE/MCA - Computers/Electronics)
Experience in working in a Linux based environment with command line.
Knowledge of Backend technologies, frameworks and languages - Python/Django, Go, Elixir, Phoenix etc.

Title: Full Stack Engineer [React and Python] - Immediate Joiner
Description:
About the job
Do you love building user-facing features and clean, efficient backend systems? Are you passionate about creating innovative tools that empower people? If so, we want you on our team!

About WorkSaga
WorkSaga helps employees effortlessly track their work, visualize their accomplishments, and chart their career journeys. We provide a dedicated workspace to organize and manage projects, ensuring every detail is captured. We're a growing company on a mission to transform the way people work, and we're seeking a talented Full Stack Engineer to join our team.
